Subject: Critical issue: Critical infrastructure issue in k8s-cluster (ap-southeast-1)

Automated detection from monitoring system:

A critical performance degradation has been detected in the k8s-cluster located in the ap-southeast-1 region. The cluster is experiencing high resource utilization, with CPU usage at 91.57% and memory usage at 95.12%. This issue is affecting all workloads running on the cluster, leading to slow response times, application timeouts, and overall degraded performance of services. The root cause is hypothesized to be either an increased workload or insufficient resource allocation. This issue is recurring and requires immediate attention.

Service: k8s-cluster
Region: ap-southeast-1
Severity: critical
Event Type: infrastructure

Metrics:
{
  "cpu_percent": 91.57,
  "memory_percent": 95.12,
  "disk_io_mbps": 384.51,
  "network_io_mbps": 390.17
}

Workaround: Scale up the cluster resources or optimize workloads to reduce CPU and memory usage. Investigate recent deployments or changes that may have increased load.

This ticket was auto-generated by the AI monitoring system.
